description:
LAST UPDATE: This Course was Last Updated on 7th July 2015. 1 New Section: Section 13 - working with customizr theme and 6 new lectures were Added!

  • NO CODING!
  • No Prior experience.
  • Free Domain & Web Hosting
  • No premium (themes & plugins) purchases..

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

NEWS: This Course was get live on 15th January 2015 and about 3000+ students have enrolled, not only that we have got 60+ five star reviews. So for the celebration we are giving our course on Special Price!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

A Course With 3000+ Students and 60+ Five star Reviews

WARNING: If you are very well trained in Wordpress, this is not the course for you.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The Basic Course Ever!

Don't have the Concept of a WordPress site? perfect.

This WordPress Course was created for you!

Take this course if either of these apply to you:

  1. You own a business and need more clients OR
  2. Your Idea involves making a website OR
  3. You are a celebrity and need to build your online presence OR
  4. You want to learn WordPress

I'll walk you through every step in how to use WordPress through a series of videos. I've also included useful resource documents for you to reference.

~I know where you're at.

~I know where you're coming from.

75 millions users use WordPress making it Number One website content management system (CMS) worldwide. This course explains the most basic features of WordPress and also deals with advanced web design concepts. By the end of this WordPress online training you will have enough knowledge to create a Professional WordPress website of your own and not only that but you can create websites for your clients.

Would you like to learn how to instantly create an amazing website for your business, blog or any other endeavor?

Would you like Google to send you the original organic traffic to your WordPress website?

Would You like me to teach you each and everything that are needed to create a professional WordPress website?

If You answered ~YES~ to every question given above, Congratulations. You are totally qualified for this Professional WordPress 2015 Course

HOW WE WILL WORK ON THIS COURSE:

  1. getting a free domain and Hosting for WordPress site
  2. Installing WordPress
  3. Installing Theme in WordPress
  4. Editing Theme of WordPress
  5. Creating some pages
  6. Editing Menus of WordPress
  7. Contact Form to receive emails
  8. Configuring Widgets of WordPress website
  9. Facebook Like box
  10. Installing Plugins in WordPress
  11. Slideshow
  12. Sharing buttons in WordPress
  13. Working with blog in WordPress
  14. Publishing Website With SEO

After taking this course you'll have a unique, professional and easy-to-use WordPress website to be proud of - and you'll have created it yourself!

You can get started right after you have enrolled in my course. So just click "Take This Course" button which will be your first step creating an amazing WordPress website from scratch

After 100% completion of this course you will be given two certificates, one by us and one by Udemy which may change your life from a struggler to a CERTIFIED WEB DEVELOPER

Best Of Luck!

See you inside the course!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

UPDATE HISTORY!

  • 29th Jan
  • 15th Feb
  • 27th March
  • 26th April
  • 12th May
  • 7th July (latest)
title: Build Professional WordPress Website
